1080482435345903616.text:
- GitHub Pull Request extension changed my life
- The @StandardJS extension made everything so much easier
- Improved path completion
- Copy relative path
- Better macOS support

1084553424077639680.text:

1063220665715699713.text:
Just shipped good-first-issue@0.7.1 with a few new things:

 --first to open up the most recent good-first-issue
 --open to cut to the chase and open the good-first-issue in your browser
 Started using @StandardJS to lint
 Made @octokit/rest.js usage asyncpic.twitter.com/5elb8FrHd8

1072523658315337728.text: Do you use the popular @npmjs library @StandardJS? Well, big news: maintainer @feross is now providing support via the Tidelift Subscription.  http://bit.ly/2QoOPUt pic.twitter.com/LPOMCkUTb6

1034647912238731264.text:
Standard 12 is out! 

- Upgrade to @geteslint version 5
- JSX fragments support
- Require spacing inside of braces
- Disallow APIs that were deprecated in Node 10
-  French translation

 npm install standard@latest -D

 Read the changelog:https://github.com/standard/standard/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#1200---2018-08-28 …
